conversations.content: Please note that this story contains spoilers for the Rage of Chronos event as well as Yurius's adventurer story.
After Chronos's plot sees the young vampire Vania brought into contact with Euden, she elects to stay at the Halidom, holding out hope of one day saving her people. In the meantime...
Blooooodkiiiiin!
Hm? Ah—WAUGH?!
Hee hee. I'm just so excited to finally have a bloodkin of my very own! C'mon, let's go play!
Ouch... *ahem* Vania, I'd hoped that our previous conversations made it clear that I can't dedicate my sole attention to you.
Whaaat? Sure you can. It's decided. I decided it.
I've gotta get way, WAY stronger if I want to help my clan stuck sleeping back in the forest.
And they say there's nothing stronger than the AMAZING bond a vampire shares with her bloodkin.
That's why we're besties now, you and me!
I...have any number of comments to make about that, but I share your desire to be good friends. You're a part of the Halidom.
When I do have time to spare, I'll gladly spend some of it with you. Okay, Vania?
Heh heh, yesss! I knew you had more than rocks rollin' around in that noggin of yours.
I'm gonna hold you to that promise, okay? We are gonna paint the town RED! With fun, I mean. Not blood.
(To be sure, I DID promise to spend time with her. Still...)
Ha ha HAA! My sorcerer princess takes your sellsword and...BLAMMO! Sends it flying! Okay, it's your turn!
(She's so given to whimsy and caprice, I have no idea what she expects of a play partner!)
Hellooo? No getting distracted! You said you'd teach me Alberian chess, so focus!
Ah, you're right. Apologies. Then I'll move my woodland archer to—
Ugh, don't bother. This is no fun when your heart's obviously not in it. New game!
What? But you were the one who asked to learn chess.
And now I'm telling you I'm over it! It's doing zip to make me feel closer to you.
True; I suppose as a competitive game, it may not foster much of a connection between opponents.
Like I said, over it. Read to me instead. Start with the book on that shelf there!
I don't mind, but isn't that the same book you dismissed as too complicated to follow the other day?
Yesterday's algebra is today's arithmetic. Now, enough back-talk. Your mistress's orders are absolute!
Are they, now...?
At it again with the spoiled little bloodsucker today, eh?
Seems like EVERY day, lately. She's glued to your side morning, noon, and night.
I'm impressed you can keep that up. I'd be tuning her out by now, no question! Even Sarisse isn't THAT bad.
But she's known such loneliness. I can't bring myself to ignore her pleas for company now.
You're a nicer guy than me, then.
Hmph. Did you two have some BUSINESS with my bloodkin?
A new job just came in. You free to head out, Euden?
Yes, if needed, I'm happy to—
What?! No, absolutely not! He's busy with me today. EXTREMELY busy! Aren't you, Euden?
...It seems I'm unavailable. I'm sorry. Can the two of you manage alone?
Yeah, it ain't anything that big. But are ya sure you wanna hand her your leash like this?
He's right, y'know. And Vania, what gives? Why are you dragging the poor man around like this?
Because I'm his mistress, duh!
So of COURSE we have to make our bond as strong as possible!
I'm sorry, your BOND? Gimme a break!
I don't think I like your tone, mister!
It's pretty rich hearing you say how close you are after watching you bully the guy all week!
He's playing along because that's the kinda guy he is, but that's ALL it is. This isn't how you connect with people!
It... Whaaat?! It's not?!
He mighta gotten a little heated there, but I'm with Luca on this one.
Listen, sister. Everybody's got their own needs. Their own life to live.
If you don't respect that and show a little consideration, there ain't a lotta room there for friendship 'n understanding.
Oh nooo... So everything I've done has been backfiring? We're still not connected? Not even a little?
Well, maybe a LITTLE... But no, not really.
Ugh, nooo! This is terrible. I can't very well become queen one day if I can't navigate the whole interpersonal relationship thing.
What do I do, then? How do I connect with my bloodkin and become a great mistress?
How about you start by asking him what HE wants to do every once in a while?
If he's struggling with something, help him out. If he's busy, give him some space. He's got his own stuff to do, outside of you.
Hm. So patience is important, then. Okay. I'll try to work on practicing a little bit of restraint.
I REALLY want to spend the day together... But I can stay behind while he works, this once.
Eyyy, she learns! You're more open-minded than I expected, honestly.
Don't go getting the wrong idea! This is all just a part of being the best mistress to my bloodkin I can be.
Just you watch—I'm going to make our bond the strongest ever in record time!
Ooh, hi, bloodkin! Are you heading out?
Hm? Yes, I've been asked to slay some fiends. I was just on my way to do that.
I want to come along! Can I? Pleeease?
I don't mind. Though...may I ask why?
Well, you know how before everybody told me I needed to start meeting you halfway?
I tried being SUPER patient and giving you your space, but it only made me want to know more about you.
Plus... It gets lonely when you're not around. So I want to tag along!
I see. I agree that making the effort to better understand one another is a good thing.
I'm just as curious to learn more about you as you are of me.
This seems as good an opportunity as any. Perhaps we can tour the town a bit once the job is done.
Yaaay! Then c'mon, buster. Let's hustle!
Unholy moly! Those fiends went down in the blink of an eye!
And that thing where your sword went all shiny like ZING and the flames came out like WHOOSH?
You were AWESOME! Now I'm ＂O-positive＂ I was right to pick you as my bloodkin.
Ha ha. You're very kind. Besides, you had a hand in making things go so quickly today.
I'm glad for the opportunity to see your handiwork up close. Vampires wield quite the diverse arsenal of powers, don't they?
Yup! We do way more than just suck blood. We can stop a creature with a stare...
Ooh, and bats! We can sway a whole cloud of them into helping us fight.
Truly?! That sounds quite fantastical. And all vampires possess these abilities?
Hmmm, I'm trying to remember... I think a trueblood like me can do more than your average vampire, actually.
But the queen and her bloodkin were way, WAY stronger than I am now!
That's why I'm in such a rush to strengthen our bond and—
Ooh, look over there!
Hm? What is it?
That shop looks neat. I wanna check it out!
Huh. Seems they sell gifts for children. All right, let's have a look.
Whoa, it's floor-to-ceiling stuffed animals and wall-to-wall picture books! I've never SEEN so many toys!
Spy anything you'd like?
This isn't for me, silly! It would be a souvenir to bring back to my family.
Ah, yes. You did mention a little brother.
Yeah! My head's still kinda foggy, so I can't remember too clearly...
But I'm pretty sure he's sleeping there in the woods. I thought it'd be nice for him to wake up to a gift. Best sister ever, huh?
That IS very kind. I have a younger sister I'm also unable to see right now, so I know how you feel.
Really? We're two peas in a pod, then. Say... It's hard, huh? Not having your family there with you.
You've got me, though, so buck up! Show me those pearly whites!
Vania...
Heh. Thank you. I feel the same as I used to when my little sister would cheer me up.
I've told you before, I'm the big sister here, by a LOT. Still... Thanks for talking to me about her.
I feel like I know you a little better now. Today I learned you're a doting brother with some flashy sword moves!
I'd say today's little outing was SUPER worth our time. I feel closer to being the ideal mistress already!
And I'm still only getting started here. Just you watch, mister!
Oh, I will. Today has been instructive for me too. I see you're a hard worker, and a generous big sister.
This has been nice. Let's continue to learn more about one another like this, bit by bit. Consider it a promise, Vania.
Then I promise, too. ...Ooh! I just had the best idea!
(I'll mark the occasion by gifting him some flowers. An amazing idea from an amazing mistress, if I do say so myself.)
I remembered I had something to do today, so why don't you be a good little bloodkin and wait right there? I'll be right back!
What? Wait, Vania. It's not safe to go running off alone!
Hello? Immortal vampire? Now, sit! Stay! Good boy!
Vania, I still don't—ah! She's gone.
She told me to wait, but I really don't think that's—
AAAAAH!
Vania?! I knew it... Hold on! I'm coming!
AAAAAH!
Vania?!
Rgh, the traitor prince?! I'd hoped to get this over with before he noticed. Hurry! Bind the trueblood!
Sir!
The Empire is after her?! Vania! Are you hurt?!
Oh, I'm fine. They just startled me a little. I'm not afraid of these mooks!
Quickly, get behind me!
Huh? No, I can fight! You know I'm tough. This'll go way quicker if we team up.
There, see? No problem! And if it's me AND my bloodkin's power together, we—
Waugh?!
VANIA! That's why I told you to hide behind me!
What? Why?! If you'd just work with me here, we'd be through with these chumps in two seconds!
It's just the two of them! Surround them and strike from all sides! Use our numbers!
Even more reinforcements? This isn't good. At this rate—
We have the advantage! Now! Seize the vampire!
Not today! Howl, my thunder!
Are you all right, Euden? The Knights of Levin will take this fight. I'll open a path for your retreat!
Albert?! What's brought you here?
We can speak once we're to safety. For now, RUN!
You too, Yurius? All right... Understood. Vania, can you stand? We need to get away from this place!
*huff* *pant* Ugh, I'm wiped.
We should be past their reach here. Now... Albert, Yurius. Why are you here?
You both left the Halidom in search of the seeds of the abyss.
Indeed. Our probe revealed that Phares had given seeds to a number of soldiers as part of some experiment.
We chased those rumors here, determined to put a stop to whatever he's planning.
What?! You believe my brother is trying to use Vania and the seeds to some ill end?
We don't know the specifics any better than you, but he is all but certainly plotting something, and they're involved.
Hey, what are these ＂seeds of the abyss＂?
An extremely dangerous breed of dragon. They are too great a force for mankind to wield. Should they try...this is the result.
Ew, what IS that?! It's all wriggly and slimy and...EWWW!
That is the price of said hubris. The seeds feed on human mana and fuse with it. They are a cursed thing.
Now, a group of extremists within the Empire who hold the seeds seek vampire blood. The situation grows ever more grim.
And Vania will continue to be a target until we stop them.
Exactly. Which brings me to a proposal. Will you allow us to serve as her guards?
Doing so would help us in our quest to destroy the seeds as well. A mutually beneficial arrangement for all parties.
I agree. The information you've uncovered while tracking them will be vital to figuring out how the extremists knew about her.
But we've yet to hear the most important opinion on the matter. What say you, Vania?
Fine by me. A friend of yours is a friend of mine.
Nice to have you on board, Uncle Sparky. Uncle Slimy.
＂Uncle＂?!
You? The lightning magic guy is Sparky, and you, Mr. Unspeakable Tentacles man, you're Uncle Slimy.
Adjectives aside, I'm still not of an age fit to be anyone's... *ahem* It matters not. We need to formulate our plan.
Euden, let us pool our intel about the seeds and the trueblood to see if we can turn up a link between them.
We still know little of vampires, let alone their higher echelon.
Of course. I'm no expert myself, but here's what I've gathered so far...
...He's just droning on and on. Everything coming out of his mouth is so complicated. I'm bored.
Right. I'm going out to the garden.
*siiigh*
What has you sneaking off to sigh in secret, my little troublemaker?
WAUGH! Don't scare me like that, Uncle Slimy! And can't you tell? I'm depressed.
My bloodkin's completely ignoring me. Today's been awful from start to finish.
It finally felt like we were getting to know each other a little and starting to gel, but then he wouldn't work with me at all.
I guess our bond's still too weak. How am I supposed to take it to the next level?
Ah, I see now. I fear you've been laboring under a misconception from the very start.
Bonds are neither forged nor tempered intentionally.
Say that in normal words.
Bonds grow stronger on their own as you learn about, care for, and trust another. At least, that has always been my experience.
I certainly can't recall ever attempting to intentionally strengthen my connection to the captain.
Indeed, I even sought to sever that tie, once. But he trusted in me so thoroughly that all my designs failed... The jerk.
Hmmm... So you're saying there's not enough trust between us.
At the very least, the softhearted prince does not yet seem to regard you as an equal.
Rather, he seems to view you as a child— a little sister to be shielded from harm. Do you not get the same impression?
Ah...! He DID say something like that! Ugh, how many times do I have to tell him that I'M the older sibling here?!
I suspected as much. Then your first step must be to win his respect as a peer.
Make him acknowledge your strength as you fight these foes. Prove you are no helpless waif.
Yeah... Yeah! Okay, got it! I just need to prove that I'm the mistress around here!
That's exactly what I thought at first, too. I'll give it another try!
You're a surprisingly nice guy, Uncle Slimy. I appreciate this!
Hah. I've done nothing worthy of thanks. I just saw you looking so pathetic that I couldn't keep my mouth shut. That's all.
What? The seeds of the abyss can be controlled using Vania's blood?
I can't speak to the truth of it, but our imperial friends certainly think so.
Alone, those seeds are far more than man can handle, so they think to fight fire with fire. Neutralize one poison with another.
If they COULD be controlled, the seeds would be a weapon without peer. And I say that from personal experience.
That doesn't make it okay to take a lady's blood and use it on some slimy tentacle thing. Have a little class, jeez!
Agreed. What's more, if it's solely her blood they're after, she may be as useful to them dead as alive.
I say we leave Vania in the safety of the Halidom and set out to destroy those seeds as soon as possible.
We might, if we knew their location. But our intelligence source went silent just after we learned of all this.
They probably went on high alert after learning that we've started guarding her.
It's odd—they never seemed quite so careful until now. If anything, they were hasty. Desperate.
Hmph. Perhaps some third party stepped in to guide them. In any case, taking the initiative to strike first isn't an option.
But neither can we sit idle while they hold those seeds. It's quite the conundrum.
Is it, though? We just dangle me out there as bait and grab 'em when they show up.
However sneaky they're trying to be, they won't turn down a chance like that. Boom, easy.
Maybe so, but I don't... No. I can't allow it. The risk is too great. It's tantamount to willingly walking into their trap.
And there you go treating me like a child again. I will be FINE, thankyouverymuch!
You watched me beat that nasty ol' dragon before, didn't you?
I did. But didn't you say the trueblood powers you used then were only temporary?
Okay, so I'm not QUITE that strong right now, but I'm still unstoppable when I put my game face on!
Even so...
She says she can handle it. Why not take her at her word?
You tell him, Uncle Slimy!
We've all seen that she's a capable fighter. And frankly, we haven't many alternatives, nor the luxury of waiting.
They may set a trap, but what's safer than luring them to a fortified position?  Or would you rather allow them free use of the seeds?
Well, no...
Fine. But we don't go in without a solid plan. Is that understood, Vania?
Duh. Obviously. Okay, time to show you what I can do when I put my mind to it!
The Day of the Decoy Operation Thoroughfare
All right. We'll be nearby, as discussed. The moment you feel in danger, fall back.
I know, I know. Just use my powers to lure them out, right? I'll be fiiine. Go and hide already!
He's such a worrywart. Now, let's do this!
Guess I'll start with some neighborhood fiends. Time to get wrecked!
Growr?!
...Anybody want to show up yet? No? Ugh. If they're not coming, I'm just going home.
That wouldn't do at all. We're running short on time. We need the trueblood now.
You know our orders, men: take her by any means necessary!
Finally, the bad guys turn up! But did you really think I'd lose to an ambush I saw coming?
Let's go, bloodkin! Sparky, Slimy, you too!
Right! I'll stay at Vania's side. You two watch the rear!
Leave it to us! Echo forth, thunder's roar!
Out come the knights in shining armor. No matter. Crush them all, men! Attack!
Sir!
An optimistic plan. Hrah!
Drop the useless bravado! Do you really think to overcome our numbers?!
Rgh... There ARE more of them than last time.
But it would take more still to best a Knight of Levin!
*sigh* Then I suppose I ought to put some effort in as well—Tentacle Phantasma!
Nroaaaaugh?!
Whoaaa, NICE! Not bad, you two!
Impressive as ever. Now let's stay focused and play our part. Blazing Circlet!
You got it. Have a little taste of what a vampire can do!
Nraaaugh!
Heh heh. This is what you get for coming at me! Now, weapons on the floor. Get those hands over your heads!
Nrgh... A vampire's abilities are truly terrifying. But our resolve is greater still!
Huh? Wait, hold up, just what are you—
Seed of the abyss! Take this body as your sustenance!
Now is the hour to unleash your awesome might upon the world! Devour the trueblood, and claim her power!
Lord Phares! Bear witness to my resolve! NraaaOOOOOOORGH!
Aaah! What's happening?!
No! The seed of the abyss is stirring! Once it wakes, it will begin devouring all life in the area to fuel its rampage!
And the fool who used it will be consumed, becoming a mindless puppet of wanton destruction.
Grrgh... GruuuaaaOARGH...!
Eeagh?! Wh-why is it coming THIS way?! S-stop! Please, don't—!
Nooo! I don't want to die! Eat them if you have to, not ME!
Ewww! Now something gross is sprouting out of that old guy, too. We've gotta stop it!
Right. The seed must be destroyed and pried loose of its host as soon as possible. I'm afraid it won't be that simple, though.
It's absorbing them all and growing at a terrifying rate! Rrgh... We can't get close enough to attack!
GrrrAAAOOOARGH!
Damn. It's nearly devoured them all. It will soon turn its attentions to us! It... It's coming for me!
Euden!
Your Highness!
...Not happening!
Aaagh! Ow ow ow... That really HURT!
Vania!
Blood... True...blood! TRUEBLOOOD...! NROOOAAAAARGH!
Damnable seed! It's drinking the blood from her wound just now!
I can feel its power surging from here. All that, after just a few drops. Her blood is as terrifying a catalyst as they say.
Are you all right?! Why did you take that blow for me? You're the one they're after!
It's only natural I would. After all, I'm your...mistress, bloodkin.
Vania!
It's only right that I protect you. Plus...
How am I supposed to forge a bond with you if I don't prove I'm strong enough to deserve your trust?
Vania... Was that weighing on you this whole time? Is that why you...?
I'm sorry. You may be right that I haven't fully trusted in your strength until now. My urge to protect you was a selfish one.
You really are incredibly strong. You're every bit my equal, and all this time, you've only wanted to be seen as such.
I finally understand that. Vania... I'm clearly not the quickest learner, but can we start anew? This time as trusted peers?
I thought you'd never ask. A bloodkin and his vampire are unstoppable because of the super strong bond they share!
Now what do you say we prove it? Listen to me for once and let's kick that thing's slimy butt!
Right! The seed must be destroyed. And we'll see it done, by our combined might!
Grrrgh... GrrrAAAOOOARGH!
Hah!
GroAAARGH!
Man, we're good at this!
Agreed! Now we rush them down!
Obviously! I'll take point. Make sure you keep up!
On my mark... NOW!
Right behind you! Taaake...THIS!
GraaaOOOARGH!
Ugh, that STILL wasn't enough? Learn to take a hint and just DIE already!
Our blows are definitely landing, but this specimen seems far sturdier than the one I faced—and I have a hunch as to why.
Yes. It's thanks to the little lady's blood it absorbed. I have to admit I'm impressed at just how potent a trueblood's essence is.
Stop praising the thing and help me think of a plan. There must be a way out of this!
We need to exhaust its energy or destroy the core in one go, and we're not equipped to do either.
Even if the prince shapeshifts, we still lack for a decisive final blow.
Then stand back and let me do it.
What?!
Just ask my bloodkin how awesome I am when I go all out. He's seen it firsthand.
I have, but... I thought that power was lost to you.
Maybe so, but I've still got the next best thing. I'm a vampire, after all!
Just what are you planning to do?
I'm gonna need a little blood, buster. With a sip of your life juice, I'll be unstoppable!
What?! You can't be serious. My blood is—
Too strong for me? Basically poison? Duh. So I'll writhe in pain a little. Big whoop.
I just need to grit my teeth and bear it, and I'll have all the power I could ever need! I'm ready for you.
Don't worry. You know I've grown. WE'VE grown. I won't let myself be domineered by a little blood this time!
Still, I...
BloOd...bLOoD... TruEBLOoD! GroooAAAR!
Doesn't look like it's going to wait patiently while we discuss the matter, Prince.
He's right. This stalemate won't last long. What's your call, Euden?
Rgh...
Do you still not trust me?
I can handle it. I'm ready for this. Please, just believe in me.
...It's true. You ARE stronger than I think. All right. If you say you're ready, I'll take you at your word.
Here—take the blood from this wound.
Right! Down the hatch... Ngh?!
Ngaaah... aaaAAAH! GraaaAAAAAUGH!
Vania! Are you all right?! Was the blood still too much?!
Aa...ahhh! Ngh... *gasp* *pant* Fine... I'm fine.
Just...took me by surprise a bit. But I'm all right now. I can feel the power surging!
Okay, abyss seed! Time for a taste of what I can REALLY do!
Have a taste of...THIS!
GrrROAAAaaaAAAaaaugh!
*heave* *gasp* There. Looks like...that did it.
The seed's broken apart—it's detaching from its host! You've actually done it... Remarkable. It's finished, then.
Yes, it seems... No, wait!
All the mana is converging on one point... This is bad! The seed is using the last of its power to attack the little lady!
What?! Rrgh, we can't reach her in time! Run, Vania!
Ngh... No use. Too...tired...
VANIA!
You're not touching her!
...The seed's gone silent. All that's left is a husk.
*cough* *pant* Good. We managed to stop it. Are you all right, Vania?
I'm great. You gave me your blood, AND you shielded me.
...Heh heh. I never doubted you would. I guess our bond won out in the end.
Without a doubt. This victory was won through our teamwork. We can finally breathe easy.
The Halidom, a few days after the seed's destruction...
Blooodkiiin, I've got nothing to do today. Entertain me!
Very well. Shall we read a picture book? Or perhaps you fancy another go at chess?
Hmmm, those both sound fun, but what I'd REALLY like to do is...
Yesss? Who is it?
Hello to the Halidom's newest BFFs.
Uncle Sparky! You said you were off to investigate the incident. Did you finish?
We got about as far as we're able for now. And along the way, we came across a key piece of information... Yurius?
I'll get right to the point. A portion of the seed's husk was taken from the scene. We don't know by whom, or where they went.
Seriously?! We went to all that trouble to destroy the thing, and someone swiped it?
We were distracted by our injuries at the time, but still... Escaping with the seed amid that chaos? It must've been planned.
If that's the case, though, why were they so sloppy in their execution? Did my brother know all along the seed would be destroyed?
Most likely. However it ended, it was a useful experiment for him. After all, simply possessing the seeds poses an undeniable danger to the holder.
If he proved able to control them, he wins; if the seed was destroyed, it still has its uses. I expect he calculated as much.
I see. Then my brother still has some sort of scheme up his considerable sleeves.
Meaning that we can't sit idly by. Yurius and I will continue to pursue the matter.
Huh. Sounds like you guys have your plates full, then.
Very. Things worked out this time around thanks to your help, but there's no telling what will happen next time.
Well... If something does come up, my bloodkin and I will make a special exception and lend you a hand.
Wait. Really?
Sure. You gave me some pretty solid advice about strengthening our bond.
Which is SUPER strong now, by the way. So yeah... Thanks. I owe you a little favor or two for that!
I don't recall giving you any advice. Did HE say something to you? ...Yurius, playing relationship counselor?
No comment, Captain. Now, little lady, I bid you be well. I look forward to another display of the future queen's power.
It's a date! My bloodkin and I are gonna be practically attached at the hip by then, so get ready for a REAL show.
Invest in some garters now, because it's gonna blow your socks clean off. Right, bloodkin? Tell the man!
Vania speaks true. Our bond IS stronger than ever before, after all.
Yeah! So whatever comes our way, the two of us are gonna be juuust fine. Count on it!
